item.title: Aligning Short Reads with BWA
item.description:
Aligning Short Reads with BWA

When you select the Tools ‣ DNA Assembly ‣ Align short reads item in the main menu, the Align Short Reads dialog appears. Set the value of the Align short reads method parameter to BWA. The dialog looks as follows:

There are the following parameters:

Reference sequence — DNA sequence to align short reads to. This parameter is required.

Result file name — file in SAM format to write the result of the alignment into. This parameter is required.

item.title: Building Index for BWA
item.description:
Building Index for BWA

To build the BWA index, select the Tools ‣ NGS data analysis ‣ Build index for reads mapping item in the main menu. The Build Index dialog will appear. Set the Map short reads method parameter to BWA.

The dialog looks as follows:

The parameters are as follows:

  • Reference sequence — the DNA sequence to which short reads will be aligned. This parameter is required.
